file.content: info: title: BrAPI version: '' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: /germplasm/{germplasmDbId}/mcpd: get: summary: Get the details of a specific Germplasm in MCPD format description: |- Get all MCPD details of a germplasm MCPD v2.1 spec can be found here Implementation Notes - When the MCPD spec identifies a field which can have multiple values returned, the JSON response should be an array instead of a semi-colon separated string. parameters: - description: the internal id of the germplasm in: path name: germplasmDbId required: true schema: type: string - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader' responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: title: GermplasmMCPDResponse type: object properties: '@context': $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context' metadata: $ref: '#/components/schemas/metadata' result: $ref: '#/components/schemas/GermplasmMCPD' required: - metadata - result description: OK headers: {} '400': $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest' '401': $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized' '403': $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden' '404': $ref: '#/components/responses/404NotFound' tags: - Germplasm
